name: Plum Amazing
tag_list: mobile-apps, iphone, mac, os-x, android, watermarking, photography, programming, golf, audio, recording, mashups, maps
overview:
Plum Amazing LLC., is a private Hawaii, US based international company. The company was founded in 1996 as Script Software then had a name chance to Plum Amazing in 2007.

Plum Amazing was one of the first creators of iPhone apps and makes mobile, Mac and Win application software. They are the creators of CopyPaste, iClock, iKey, KnowledgeMiner, iWatermark, NetCheck, MountDisk. They also created ChatFX (discontinued), IDTunes (discontinued), iView (sold to Microsoft), iView MediaPro (sold to Microsoft), and EasyCard (sold to Ohanaware and name changed to Fun Greetings Deluxe). Their iPhone apps are Plum Caddy (sold to Ubermind), Plum Record, Galactic Pool, Expenses, iWatermark, Cures A-Z and KidPaint (sold to MiSoft). Their Android apps are Cures A-Z and iWatermark.

Plum Amazing Software is available for contract programming and is open to partnerships for its existing applications and investment in the company.
